faq.faqDescription: Have more questions? We understand that every situation is unique.If your concern wasn't addressed in the FAQs, feel free to get in touch—we're always here to provide the support you need.

faqList.question: What are the technical requirements for learning at SkillBridge?
faqList.answer: To use SkillBridge, you need a smartphone or computer and internet access. For registration, access to one of the supported digital payment methods is required.

faqList.question: How do I get started with SkillBridge?
faqList.answer: Sign up on our website, choose your course, and follow the instructions to begin learning.

faqList.question: Do you give certificates after completion?
faqList.answer: Yes, you will receive a certificate after successfully completing your course.

faqList.question: Does SkillBridge provide job opportunities?
faqList.answer: We connect top-performing students with partner companies and job opportunities where available.

faqList.question: Who can learn your courses?
faqList.answer: Anyone with a passion for tech and willingness to learn can join our courses.

faqList.question: In what language are you providing the courses?
faqList.answer: Our courses are primarily in English, but we are working to add more languages.

faqList.question: When do we start learning the courses?
faqList.answer: You can start learning immediately after enrolling in a course.

faqList.question: What can I do if I forget my password on website registration?
faqList.answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset your password.

faqList.question: Can I get registered via email?
faqList.answer: Yes, you can register using your email address on our sign-up page.

faqList.question: Is it an online class or online course?
faqList.answer: SkillBridge offers both live online classes and self-paced online courses to fit your schedule.

navbar.searchPlaceholder: What do you want to learn?

hero.heroSubtitle: Bridging Gaps, Building Skills, Transforming Futures

services.serviceSubtitle: Bridging Skill Gaps Across Industries SkillBridge is your launchpad to real-world success. Through industry-aligned courses, immersive training, and opportunity pathways, we empower learners to build practical skills and become career-ready across diverse fields—from technology and business to design and beyond.

courses.title: Courses
courses.description: Carefully curated lessons across a range of disciplines—including tech, business, design, and analytics—built to match current industry standards and future demands.

training.title: Training
training.description: Interactive, mentor-guided training programs designed to offer hands-on experience in today’s most relevant skills—be it in software development, digital marketing, data, or entrepreneurship.

job-opportunities.title: Job-Ready Opportunities
job-opportunities.description: We help bridge the gap between learning and employment by offering capstone projects, job-matching support, internship pipelines, and talent showcases—so you’re not just skilled, but in demand.

topCoursesHeading.title: Top Courses
topCoursesHeading.subtitle: Join thousands of students in our most popular courses. Real world value you can't miss!

coursePage.description: Browse our comprehensive collection of courses designed to help you master new skills, advance your career, and achieve your learning goals.

courses.title: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp (MERN + PostgreSQL)
courses.description: Learn MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL to become a professional full-stack developer.
courses.longDescription: This 4-month immersive bootcamp is designed to take you from beginner to job-ready full-stack web developer. You'll master both front-end and back-end technologies, build 16+ real-world projects, and get guided mentorship to prepare for a successful tech career or freelance journey.
courses.instructorBio: Our team of industry professionals brings real-world software engineering experience and a passion for teaching. Learn from developers who've built scalable systems and mentored 1000+ students.
learningOutcomes: Build 16+ full-stack web development projects for your portfolio
Learn React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL in depth
Create scalable web apps and RESTful APIs from scratch
Integrate PostgreSQL with Node.js using Sequelize ORM
Deploy your applications using Docker, GitHub, and modern CI/CD pipelines
Apply best practices in professional coding and system design
prerequisites: Basic computer skills
No prior programming experience required
A computer with internet access

lessons.title: Deployment to Vercel, Render, or Railway

Through real-world projects, mentorship, and design critiques, you'll become job-ready for roles in UX/UI design or product design.

Design wireframes, mockups, and prototypes using Figma

courses.title: DSA Mastery Accelerator: Your 3-Month Path to Algorithmic Excellence
courses.description: A structured 12-week roadmap to master Data Structures and Algorithms with weekly topics and hands-on practice.
courses.longDescription: This comprehensive 3-month plan covers fundamental and advanced DSA concepts, with practice problems and review sessions designed to build problem-solving skills and prepare you for technical interviews.

learningOutcomes: Master core data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs
Understand algorithmic paradigms: sorting, recursion, greedy, dynamic programming
Develop problem-solving strategies and optimize complexity
Build a solid foundation for technical job interviews
prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge in Python or any language
Willingness to solve algorithmic problems daily
Access to coding platforms like Codeforces, LeetCode, or HackerRank

lessons.title: Python syntax and semantics: variables, data types, operators
Complexity analysis: Big O notation, time and space complexity
Sorting algorithms: bubble sort, insertion sort, selection sort
Two pointers technique: usage patterns and problems
Time and space trade-offs in sorting
Sliding window technique for fixed and variable window sizes
Prefix sums and cumulative frequency arrays
Linked List: singly, doubly linked list, basic operations
Greedy algorithms: problem-solving approach and examples
Interval scheduling and activity selection problems
Introduction to recursion and recursive problem-solving
Tree data structures: binary trees, binary search trees (BST)
Binary Search: principles, variants, and applications
Advanced sorting: merge sort, quick sort
Graph representations: adjacency list, adjacency matrix
Breadth-First Search (BFS) and shortest paths in unweighted graphs
Topological sorting of Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs)
Applications of BFS and topological sort
Heap data structure and priority queues
Union Find (Disjoint Set Union) for connected components and cycle detection
Bitwise operators and common bit manipulation tricks
Subset sum and related DP problems
Mixed topic practice combining learned concepts
Review sessions and mock interviews preparation
Final task: coding problem submission and evaluation

Project kick-off & architecture design (full-stack Next.js app)
Final presentation, deployment, and portfolio preparation

courses.title: Speak English with Confidence: 3-Month Practical Bootcamp
courses.description: Master real-world English conversation, pronunciation, and fluency through speaking-focused, interactive training.
courses.longDescription: This 3-month immersive English Bootcamp is crafted for learners who want to become confident English speakers. With a focus on pronunciation, real-world vocabulary, grammar essentials, and public speaking, you'll gain the skills needed to speak fluently and clearly in everyday and professional settings. Ideal for those preparing for job interviews, global communication, or academic presentations.
courses.instructorBio: Our experienced instructors are language experts trained in teaching English as a second language. They specialize in pronunciation, conversational fluency, and customized learning support to accelerate your growth.
learningOutcomes: Hold confident conversations in English
Improve pronunciation and reduce native accent interference
Use grammar correctly in speech and writing
Build vocabulary and expressions for daily and professional use
Understand English in movies, interviews, and live conversations
Practice public speaking, storytelling, and discussions
prerequisites: Basic ability to read and write in English
Willingness to speak and practice daily
Access to a computer or mobile with microphone

lessons.title: Speaking Practice: Greetings, Introductions, Simple Q&A
Phrasal Verbs, Idioms, and Daily Expressions
Intermediate Grammar: Modal Verbs, Conditionals, Passive Voice
Group Roleplays, Interviews, and Live Discussions

curriculum.title: Month 3: Public Speaking, Professional English & Writing

lessons.title: English for Jobs: Email, CV, Interview Prep

courses.title: Modern Accounting Mastery: Principles, Practice & Tools
courses.description: This 3-month hands-on bootcamp equips learners with strong foundations in modern accounting principles, bookkeeping, and financial software tools like Peachtree (Sage 50), QuickBooks, and Excel. Perfect for aspiring accountants, entrepreneurs, and small business managers.
courses.longDescription: Gain practical expertise in accounting fundamentals, bookkeeping techniques, financial reporting, and industry-leading software. This program prepares you for real-world accounting roles or managing your own business finances with confidence.
courses.instructorBio: Experienced trainer with a passion for making accounting clear and applicable to business owners and finance professionals.
learningOutcomes: Understand and apply core accounting principles and concepts
Perform accurate double-entry bookkeeping
Prepare key financial statements including income statement, balance sheet, and cash flow reports
Use Excel, Peachtree (Sage 50), and QuickBooks for accounting and reporting
Comprehend Ethiopian tax laws and basic reporting requirements
Gain confidence managing business finances and financial data
prerequisites: Basic computer skills
Interest in accounting or business finance
No prior accounting experience required

lessons.title: Introduction to Accounting and Financial Systems
Final Accounts: Income Statement, Balance Sheet & Cash Flow
Excel for Accounting: Formulas, Pivot Tables & Templates
Peachtree (Sage 50): Setup, Chart of Accounts & Entries
Peachtree Operations: Sales, Purchases, Inventory & Payroll
Ethiopian Taxation Basics: VAT, Withholding Tax & Reporting
Capstone Project: End-to-End Accounting for a Mock Business

courses.title: Animations & Motion Graphics Bootcamp: 2D & 3D Mastery with After Effects & Blender
courses.description: A 3-month immersive bootcamp to master professional 2D motion graphics and 3D animation using Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, and Blender.
courses.longDescription: This comprehensive program covers foundational to intermediate 2D animation and motion graphics with After Effects and Premiere Pro, combined with an introduction to 3D modeling and animation in Blender. Build a professional portfolio with hands-on projects and prepare for careers in animation and motion design.
courses.instructorBio: Experienced animators passionate about teaching practical animation skills through project-based learning and industry best practices.
learningOutcomes: Create engaging 2D motion graphics and animations using Adobe After Effects
Integrate animations into video projects with Adobe Premiere Pro
Apply core animation principles for smooth and appealing motion
Model, texture, light, and animate 3D objects using Blender
Combine 2D and 3D animations into professional video content
Build a diverse animation portfolio for professional opportunities
prerequisites: Basic computer skills and familiarity with graphic design concepts
Access to Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, and Blender software
Willingness to practice and learn through hands-on projects

lessons.title: Introduction to Motion Graphics & Core Animation Principles
Adobe After Effects Interface and Keyframing Basics
Animating Shapes, Text, and Applying Motion Presets
Advanced After Effects: Parenting, Nesting & Expressions
Working with Graph Editor and Particle Effects
Using Adobe Premiere Pro for Motion Graphics
Basic 2D Character Animation with Puppet Tool
Project 2: Short Promo Video with Animated Graphics
Animating Objects: Keyframes and Timeline Usage
Lighting, Materials, and Rendering in Blender
Final Capstone Project: 3D Animated Scene or Logo
Compositing 3D Animation with After Effects or Premiere Pro

courses.title: Research Methods and Analysis Bootcamp: Foundations to Insights
courses.description: An intensive 2-month bootcamp designed to equip learners with foundational research skills and data analysis techniques across qualitative and quantitative methods.
courses.longDescription: This bootcamp guides learners through essential research concepts, qualitative and quantitative methodologies, data analysis using popular tools, and effective research communication. Perfect for students, professionals, and aspiring researchers looking to master research fundamentals efficiently.
courses.instructorBio: Our instructors bring a blend of academic and practical research experience, focusing on clear, hands-on learning to prepare students for real-world research challenges.
learningOutcomes: Formulate clear and researchable questions and hypotheses
Conduct effective literature reviews and synthesize research
Apply qualitative data collection and analysis methods
Perform descriptive and inferential statistical analyses
Use data analysis tools like Excel, SPSS, and R
Create compelling data visualizations and reports
Communicate research findings clearly and ethically
prerequisites: Basic computer skills
Interest in research and data analysis
No prior research experience required

sessions.title: Purpose, types, and ethics of research
Surveys, interviews, and focus groups fundamentals
Sampling techniques and ensuring data quality
Intro to qualitative analysis software (e.g., NVivo basics)
Descriptive statistics: mean, median, mode, variance
Using Excel, SPSS, and R for analysis
Data visualization principles and creating charts/graphs

courses.title: Basic Computer Skills Mastery
courses.description: An 8-week beginner-friendly bootcamp to master essential computer skills, Microsoft Office, Google Workspace, and digital literacy for academic and professional success.
courses.longDescription: This comprehensive 2-month program covers everything from understanding hardware and operating systems to mastering productivity tools like Microsoft Office and Google Workspace. It also focuses on internet safety, email communication, digital etiquette, and basic troubleshooting, preparing learners for effective digital life and work.
courses.instructorBio: Passionate about empowering learners with essential computer and digital skills to thrive in today's tech-driven world.
learningOutcomes: Understand computer hardware and operating system basics
Manage files and folders efficiently
Use internet browsers safely and effectively
Compose and manage professional emails
Create documents, spreadsheets, and presentations with Microsoft Office
Collaborate using Google Workspace tools including Docs, Sheets, Slides, and Drive
Apply digital etiquette and online safety best practices
Troubleshoot common computer issues independently
prerequisites: No prior computer experience required
Access to a computer with internet connectivity
Willingness to practice daily

lessons.title: What is a computer? Hardware vs Software
Overview of Operating Systems (Windows, macOS, Linux basics)
Using the Start menu, taskbar, and system tray
Creating, saving, organizing, and searching files/folders
Introduction to text editing: Notepad, WordPad, MS Word basics
Basic keyboard shortcuts and mouse skills
Using web browsers (Chrome, Edge, Firefox) effectively
Safe browsing, phishing, and online privacy basics
Setting up and using email accounts (Gmail, Outlook)
Composing, replying, forwarding, and organizing emails
Introduction to instant messaging and video calls (WhatsApp, Zoom basics)
Digital etiquette and professionalism in communication
Word: Creating, formatting, and saving documents
Excel: Basic spreadsheet skills, formulas, and formatting
PowerPoint: Creating presentations, adding slides and visuals
Overview of Google Workspace tools (Docs, Sheets, Slides, Drive)
Creating, sharing, and collaborating in real-time
Using Google Meet for video conferencing
Google Calendar basics for scheduling and productivity
Backup essentials and data recovery basics
Real-world tasks: file management, email, web research, office tools

courses.title: Mastering AI & Data Science: From Foundations to Real-World Applications
courses.description: An immersive 4-month bootcamp focused on practical AI and data science skills. Learn Python, data analysis, machine learning, deep learning, and AI model deployment with hands-on projects.
courses.longDescription: This bootcamp takes you from foundational programming and data manipulation through machine learning, deep learning, and AI deployment. You'll build a strong portfolio solving real business problems, preparing you for a career in AI and data science.
courses.instructorBio: Experienced data scientists and AI engineers passionate about bridging theory and practical application with hands-on mentorship.
learningOutcomes: Write clean, efficient Python code for data science
Perform data cleaning, manipulation, and visualization using Pandas and Matplotlib
Build and evaluate machine learning models with scikit-learn
Understand and implement deep learning models using TensorFlow/Keras
Deploy AI models using Flask or FastAPI
Apply NLP and time series forecasting techniques
Develop real-world AI and data science projects for your portfolio
prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge recommended but not required
Comfort with mathematics (algebra, statistics basics)
Access to a computer with internet connection

lessons.title: Python Basics: Syntax, Data Types, Control Structures
Data Visualization with Matplotlib and Seaborn
Intro to Statistics & Probability for Data Science
Unsupervised Learning: Clustering and Dimensionality Reduction
Introduction to Neural Networks and Deep Learning
Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) and Sequence Models
Deploying Models with Flask and FastAPI
Capstone Project: Build and Deploy an AI Solution

courses.title: Project Management Professional (PMP) Bootcamp: Master Agile & Waterfall
courses.description: An 8-week intensive bootcamp to master project management fundamentals, Agile, Waterfall methodologies, and PMP exam preparation.
courses.longDescription: This bootcamp offers comprehensive coverage of project management principles, tools, and best practices. Learn to manage projects from initiation to closing, handle resources, risks, and communication, and prepare for PMP certification with real-world simulations and mock exams.
courses.instructorBio: Experienced project managers with a passion for teaching practical skills and PMP certification success strategies.
learningOutcomes: Plan and manage projects using Waterfall, Agile, and Hybrid methodologies
Effectively allocate resources, control costs, and mitigate risks
Communicate and manage stakeholders successfully
Use popular project management tools like MS Project and Jira
Prepare confidently for the PMP certification exam
prerequisites: Basic computer and communication skills
Interest in project management and leadership
No prior experience required

lessons.title: Project Management Overview and Key Concepts
Roles and Responsibilities of Project Managers
Work Breakdown Structure and Scheduling Techniques
Gantt Charts and Critical Path Method
Tools: MS Project and Excel for Budget Tracking
Risk Register and Quality Assurance Practices
Tools: Slack, MS Teams, and Email Best Practices

curriculum.title: Project Closing and PMP Certification Prep

lessons.title: PMP Exam Overview and Study Strategies

courses.title: Data Analysis Mastery Bootcamp: Excel, SQL & Python
courses.description: A comprehensive 3-month bootcamp to master data analysis skills using Excel, SQL, and Python for real-world business insights.
courses.longDescription: This bootcamp covers foundational data concepts, advanced Excel techniques, database querying with SQL, and data manipulation & visualization using Python. Ideal for beginners to intermediate learners aiming for data analyst roles.
courses.instructorBio: We specialize in practical data skills training focused on industry-ready knowledge and projects.
learningOutcomes: Clean and prepare datasets for analysis
Use Excel for advanced data manipulation and visualization
Write efficient SQL queries to extract business insights
Manipulate and visualize data with Python libraries
Perform exploratory data analysis and create impactful reports
prerequisites: Basic computer and spreadsheet skills
Willingness to practice regularly
No prior coding experience required

success.title: Why Choose Skillbridge?
success.subtitle: Join our global community of learners and transform your career with our industry-leading courses.

footer.title: About SkillBridge
footer.description: Bridging Gaps, Building Skills, Transforming Futures. We provide high-quality online courses to help you advance your career.

contactPage.description: We're happy to help! Reach out to us for any questions, feedback, or support.

aboutPage.title: “Driven by purpose. Built to bridge Skill Gaps.”
aboutPage.description: SkillBridge Institute of Technology – Empowering future professionals with real-world skills, guided mentorship, and project-based learning that leads to career success.
aboutPage.storySubheading: From Passion to Purpose — Empowering the Next Generation of Talent
aboutPage.storyText1: SkillBridge Institute of Technology (SBIT) was created to close the gap between traditional education and the rapidly evolving demands of today’s workforce. Many talented individuals face outdated teaching methods and limited practical experience that hold them back from reaching their full potential.
aboutPage.storyText2: What began as a small coding bootcamp has grown into a global hub for immersive, project-based learning across a wide range of disciplines — from software development and data science to business skills, digital marketing, and beyond.
aboutPage.storyText3:
Today, SBIT equips learners from all walks of life with the knowledge, mentorship, and hands-on opportunities they need to succeed and thrive in their chosen fields. 
 We believe that with the right support and practical experience, anyone can build a meaningful and impactful career. At SBIT, we don’t just teach skills — we build future innovators, creators, and leaders.

purpose.title: Our Purpose
purpose.subtitle: We exist to democratize education and create pathways for anyone to build a successful career in their chosen field.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To provide world-class, practical education that transforms lives. We bridge the gap between learning and doing, ensuring every graduate is not only knowledgeable but job-ready and confident.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become a global standard for practical education, where talent and dedication matter more than traditional credentials. We envision a world where our graduates lead innovation and excellence across diverse industries.

checkpoint.point3: Leadership development for lasting industry influence

methodology.title: Our Learning Methodology
methodology.description: How we turn beginners into job-ready professionals

lists.heading: Learn by Doing
lists.paragraph: Start coding from day one.  Every concept is immediately practiced through hands-on projects that mirror real-world challenges.

lists.heading: Build Real Projects
lists.paragraph: Create solutions that address actual problems. Your portfolio will showcase practical work, not just exercises.

lists.heading: Get Expert Feedback
lists.paragraph: Receive detailed reviews and personalized guidance from experienced professionals who understand the path you’re on.

lists.heading: Land Your Dream Job
lists.paragraph: Leverage our industry connections, interview preparation, and job placement support to help you secure your first role and succeed.

whyUs.title: Why Students Choose SkillBridge
whyUs.subtitle: The learning experience that truly prepares you for your career

cards.title: Industy-Relevant Curriculum
cards.description: Our courses are designed by professionals and regularly updated to reflect current market demands and emerging trends. Stay ahead with practical skills that employers actively seek.

cards.title: Expert Instuctors
cards.description: Learn from experienced practitioners and leaders who bring real-world insights into the classroom. Gain guidance from those who know what it takes to succeed.

cards.title: Hands-On Learning
cards.description: Build real projects and gain practical experience through our project-based approach. Every lesson includes exercises that reinforce your skills and build a strong portfolio.

cards.title: Career Support
cards.description: Comprehensive career services including resume building, interview coaching, and placement assistance. Our dedicated team supports you from day one to help you reach your goals.

cards.title: Flexible Learning
cards.description: Choose between self-paced, online, and in-person options that fit your schedule and lifestyle. Whether you prefer learning at your own speed or engaging in a structured environment, we offer flexible pathways to support your success.

cards.title: Proven Results
cards.description: Our graduates emerge confident, skilled, and ready to tackle real-world challenges. The transformative impact of our programs is seen in their growth—both personally and professionally—as they become lifelong learners and adaptable problem-solvers.

learningPaths.title: Complete Learning Paths
learningPaths.subtitle: From zero to hired - structured programs that get results.

courseLists.description: Master React, Node.js, databases, and cloud deployment. Build 5 full-stack applications.
Build iOS and Android apps with React Native and Flutter. Deploy to app stores.
